data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.1.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2 PB 3
data.expected_result: Status bar should be in white color.
data.short_description: [Dark Theme only] Status bar with wrong color for kick/ban screens
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have dark theme enabled and/or kick/ban permission - Long press a user or open the user settings via the member list - Click on `Kick` or `Ban` - Observe the color of the status bar
